examples: I have never seen her before.
Please arrive 15 minutes before the start of the movie.
Before you make a decision, consider all your options.
Por favor, chegue 15 minutos antes do início do filme.
Antes de tomar uma decisão, considere todas as opções.

suggested: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field...before the crows came.
The calm before the storm can be a time of anticipation, but also fear and sadness.
It's always frustrating when you arrive at a restaurant 5 minutes before closing and they won't let you in.
Before the invention of color television, people thought everything in the world was black and white.
The smell of rain before a storm can be refreshing or ominous.
The feeling of a cool breeze before a hot summer day.
Before we can move forward, it's important to reflect on the lessons we've learned from our past.
